titles.title: To express the sense of the House of Representatives that the maximum Pell Grant should be increased to $5,800.
To express the sense of the House of Representatives that the maximum Pell Grant should be increased to $5,800.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on 21st Century Competitiveness.

committee.name: House Education and the Workforce
committee.subcommittee: Higher Education and Workforce Development Subcomittee

bill.summary: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the maximum Pell Grant, under student aid provisions of the Higher Education Act of 1965, should be increased to $5,800.
